workLog.details: Created session log, loaded Serena instructions via mcp__serena__initial_instructions, read HANDOFF.md and usage-mandatory memory
Found issue #998 (Phase 2: Graph Traversal) was CLOSED on 1/25/2026. Retrieved issue context showing implementation was completed in sessions 924-926
Installed ai-agents package with python-frontmatter dependency using pip3 install --break-system-packages -e . from repo root

Tested graph CLI with both BFS and DFS strategies: PYTHONPATH=. python3 -m scripts.memory_enhancement graph memory-index --strategy {bfs|dfs}. Both work correctly, showing traversal order, nodes visited, max depth, and cycle detection

All exit criteria from Implementation Card met: (1) scripts/memory_enhancement/graph.py exists, (2) python -m memory_enhancement graph <root> traverses links successfully, (3) Works with existing Serena memory format
